audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Claims functional optimization of design process with reduced cycles, which fits Tier 1. However, lacks specific metrics for the claimed 'significant' reduction.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Gucci) but claims are vague without quantified improvements. Source appears to be marketing/promotional content rather than authoritative case study.
audited_claims.notes: Design cycle optimization is valid Tier 1, but needs specific metrics and authoritative sourcing

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes process efficiency improvement in design iteration, which is appropriate Tier 1 functional optimization.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization but lacks quantification of 'fraction of the time' - no specific time savings metrics provided. Source quality uncertain.
audited_claims.notes: Valid optimization claim but needs quantified time savings to be fully credible

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Virtual prototyping for waste reduction and process acceleration fits Tier 1 optimization criteria well.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific process description, but lacks quantified waste reduction or time savings metrics.
audited_claims.notes: Good process description but needs quantified sustainability and efficiency metrics

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Brand valuation ranking is not a functional optimization - this is market positioning data, not operational improvement.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric and timeframe provided, but not relevant to Tier 1 capability assessment.
audited_claims.notes: Market positioning data, not operational capability improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: NFT innovation represents new market/product creation rather than functional optimization of existing processes.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Factual claim but represents innovation/market creation, not process optimization.
audited_claims.notes: Innovation/market creation activity, not functional optimization - potentially tier 1

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Revenue figures are financial performance data, not functional optimization metrics.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific financial data but not relevant to operational capability assessment.
audited_claims.notes: Financial performance data, not operational improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Social media follower counts are marketing metrics, not functional optimization indicators.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metrics provided but not relevant to operational capability improvement.
audited_claims.notes: Marketing reach metrics, not operational capability

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Customer demographic data is market analysis, not functional process optimization.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific demographic data but not relevant to operational improvement assessment.
audited_claims.notes: Market demographic data, not operational capability

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: E-commerce sales percentage is channel mix data, not functional optimization.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric but represents channel strategy rather than operational improvement.
audited_claims.notes: Sales channel data, not operational optimization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Demographic sales data is market analysis, not functional capability improvement.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Authoritative source (CEO quote) but not relevant to operational optimization.
audited_claims.notes: Market demographic data, not operational capability

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Financial growth metrics are performance outcomes, not functional optimization processes.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific financial metrics but not relevant to operational capability assessment.
audited_claims.notes: Financial performance data, not operational improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Parent company revenue growth is financial performance, not functional optimization.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific financial data but not relevant to operational capability improvement.
audited_claims.notes: Financial performance data, not operational capability

tier_verification: Only claims C1-C3 relate to AI-driven functional optimization (design process improvements). Claims C4-C12 are market/financial data not relevant to tier 1 assessment. The AI design claims need stronger quantification and authoritative sourcing to be fully approved.
